location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Collin Mactavish, Assistant Surgeon, in charge at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government of the death of the Resident in the Persian Gulf, John Macleod, and Assistant Surgeon Edward Milward; it also notes the deaths of Captain Soilliux and Mr Sturney.It further notes that Mactavish had to leave Bussora [Basra] on account of ill health, and that the Resident, prior to his death placed him in charge of the Bushire Residency pending the future instructions of Government.
